Name: Praesidium
About the game: Praesidium is a third-person, speedrunner, action platformer set on the rooftops of a futuristic city. Make your way through the city with the help of your advanced shield that can create hovering gravity fields to launch you forward. Dodge and block turrets as they try to stun you and slow you down. Move as fast as possible through the level to set your best time. Features Play as the runner in a high-tech armored suit that keeps you agile while protecting you from high velocities Use your shield to destroy electric stun turrets and breakable walls or to create multiple hovering gravity fields to traverse long gaps and find new shortcuts Multiple replayable levels within neon-lit sci-fi environments Track your best times within the menu and try to beat your fastest run Original Synthwave music tracks
